languages.text: {n}Голос бога гремит праведным возмущением и ядом уязвленной гордыни.{/n} "Отринуть эту великую мощь? Отказаться от права проложить дорогу грядущему?! Подобный путь постыден для служителя Омниссии!"

{n}The god's voice thunders with righteous indignation and the venom of wounded pride:{/n} "To shun this great power? To renounce the right to forge the future? Such a path is shameful for a servant of the Omnissiah!"
languages.original_text: {n}Голос бога гремит праведным возмущением и ядом уязвленной гордыни.{/n} "Отринуть эту великую мощь? Отказаться от права проложить дорогу грядущему?! Подобный путь постыден для служителя Омниссии!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The god's voice thunders with righteous indignation and the venom of wounded pride.{/n} "To shun this great power? To renounce the right to pave the way for the future? A path like that is shameful for a servant of the Omnissiah!"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The god's voice thunders with righteous indignation and the venom of wounded pride.{/n} "To shun this great power? To renounce the right to pave the way for the future? A path like that is shameful for a servant of the Omnissiah!"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The god's voice thunders with righteous indignation and the venom of wounded pride.{/n} "To shun this great power? To renounce the right to forge the future? Such a path is shameful for a servant of the Omnissiah!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The god's voice thunders with righteous indignation and the venom of wounded pride:{/n} "To shun this great power? To renounce the right to forge the future? Such a path is shameful for a servant of the Omnissiah!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The god's voice thunders with righteous indignation and the venom of wounded pride:{/n} "To shun this great power? To renounce the right to forge the future? Such a path is shameful for a servant of the Omnissiah!"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}ほとばしる神の声には、義憤とプライドを傷つけられた恨みが混じっている。{/n}「この大いなる力を忌む？未来に向かって前進する権利を捨てる？そのような道は、万機神の従者として恥ずべきものだ！」
languages.original_text: {n}The god's voice thunders with righteous indignation and the venom of wounded pride:{/n} "To shun this great power? To renounce the right to forge the future? Such a path is shameful for a servant of the Omnissiah!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ほとばしる神の声には、義憤とプライドを傷つけられた恨みが混じっている。{/n}「この大いなる力を忌む？未来に向かって前進する権利を捨てる？そのような道は、万機神の従者として恥ずべきものだ！」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}神明的声音中响起了正义的激愤与恶毒，他的自尊心似乎受到了伤害。{/n}“要放弃这伟大的力量吗？要放弃创造未来的权利吗？对欧姆尼塞亚的仆人而言，这样的道路是可耻的！”
languages.original_text: {n}The god's voice thunders with righteous indignation and the venom of wounded pride:{/n} "To shun this great power? To renounce the right to forge the future? Such a path is shameful for a servant of the Omnissiah!"

traits.locale_text: {n}神明的声音中响起了正义的激愤与恶毒，他的自尊心似乎受到了伤害。{/n}“要放弃这伟大的力量吗？要放弃创造未来的权利吗？对欧姆尼塞亚的仆人而言，这样的道路是可耻的！”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Vous voudriez renier un tel pouvoir ? » {n}s'exclame le dieu d'une voix tonitruante, où se mêlent indignation et fierté blessée.{/n} « Renoncer à la possibilité de forger l'avenir ? Et ainsi couvrir les serviteurs de l'Omnimessie de honte ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The god's voice thunders with righteous indignation and the venom of wounded pride:{/n} "To shun this great power? To renounce the right to forge the future? Such a path is shameful for a servant of the Omnissiah!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous voudriez renier un tel pouvoir ? » {n}s'exclame le dieu d'une voix tonitruante, où se mêlent indignation et fierté blessée.{/n} « Renoncer à la possibilité de forger l'avenir ? Et ainsi couvrir les serviteurs de l'Omnimessie de honte ? »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}La voz del dios retumba con una indignación justificada y la furia del orgullo herido.{/n} «¿Rechazar este gran poder? ¿Renunciar al derecho de moldear el futuro? ¡Es un camino vergonzoso para un sirviente del Omnissiah!».
languages.original_text: {n}The god's voice thunders with righteous indignation and the venom of wounded pride:{/n} "To shun this great power? To renounce the right to forge the future? Such a path is shameful for a servant of the Omnissiah!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz del dios retumba con una indignación justificada y la furia del orgullo herido.{/n} «¿Rechazar este gran poder? ¿Renunciar al derecho de moldear el futuro? ¡Es un camino vergonzoso para un sirviente del Omnissiah!».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Die Stimme des Gottes donnert vor rechtschaffener Entrüstung und dem Gift verwundeten Stolzes.{/n} "Diese große Macht abzulehnen? Das Recht aufzugeben, die Zukunft zu gestalten? Ein solcher Pfad ist schändlich für einen des Omnissiah!"
languages.original_text: {n}The god's voice thunders with righteous indignation and the venom of wounded pride:{/n} "To shun this great power? To renounce the right to forge the future? Such a path is shameful for a servant of the Omnissiah!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Stimme des Gottes donnert vor rechtschaffener Entrüstung und dem Gift verwundeten Stolzes.{/n} "Diese große Macht abzulehnen? Das Recht aufzugeben, die Zukunft zu gestalten? Ein solcher Pfad ist schändlich für einen des Omnissiah!"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Tanrının sesi, erdemli bir öfkeyle ve yaralanmış bir gururun zehriyle gürlüyor.{/n} "Bu büyük gücü bir kanara mı bırakayım? Geleceği şekillendirme hakkını ret mi edeyim? Böylesi bir yol, Hermesih'in hizmetkârları için utanılasıdır!"
languages.original_text: {n}The god's voice thunders with righteous indignation and the venom of wounded pride:{/n} "To shun this great power? To renounce the right to forge the future? Such a path is shameful for a servant of the Omnissiah!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Tanrının sesi erdemli bir öfkeyle ve yaralanmış bir gururun zehriyle gürlüyor:{/n} "Bu büyük gücü bir kanara mı bırakayım? Geleceği şekillendirme hakkını ret mi edeyim? Böylesi bir yol bir Hermesih hizmetkârı için utanç kaynağıdır!"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
